team.name: Nicholas Gregory
team.bioHtml: Worked in Financial Technology for the last 10 years.  Background in software companies and technical leadership.  Big Data, Bitcoin/Blockchain Technologies.

jobs.title: Open Source Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We're currently seeking to hire talented engineers to join our team and contribute to the Bitcoin / Blockchain open-source project.  Must be passionate about bitcoin & cryptocurrencies. 

Primary software is built in C++ and Rust.  

Projects include
- Bitcoin Core
- Lightning Network
- Side Chains

Please look at projects on our github page: https://github.com/commerceblock

jobs.title: Dev Ops Engineer
jobs.description:
CommerceBlock has engineered the first platform for enabling global economic trade in a secure, private and efficient manner on public blockchains.

We're currently seeking to hire a talented engineers to join our team and build infrastructure to run open Bitcoin / Blockchain open-source projects.
